mapper.select: SELECT i.GCOUN_CD, i.GCOUN_DT, i.GCOUN_NM, i.CSL_NO, i.GCOUN_BGNG_DT, i.GCOUN_DDLN_DT, i.GCOUN_LMT_COUNT, i.GCOUN_DTL_CN, i.GCOUN_PROG_STA_NM, i.GCOUN_FILENM, i.GCOUN_CONTS_CN, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM GROUP_COUN_APPLICANT a WHERE a.GCOUN_CD = i.GCOUN_CD AND a.GCOUN_STA_NM = '신청중') AS GCOUN_REG_COUNT FROM GROUP_COUN_INFO i ORDER BY i.GCOUN_DT

SELECT i.GCOUN_CD, i.GCOUN_DT, i.GCOUN_NM, i.CSL_NO, i.GCOUN_BGNG_DT, i.GCOUN_DDLN_DT, i.GCOUN_LMT_COUNT, i.GCOUN_DTL_CN, i.GCOUN_PROG_STA_NM, i.GCOUN_FILENM, i.GCOUN_CONTS_CN, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM GROUP_COUN_APPLICANT a WHERE a.GCOUN_CD = i.GCOUN_CD AND a.GCOUN_STA_NM = '신청중') AS GCOUN_REG_COUNT FROM GROUP_COUN_INFO i WHERE i.GCOUN_PROG_STA_NM = #{status} ORDER BY i.GCOUN_DT

SELECT i.GCOUN_CD, i.GCOUN_DT, i.GCOUN_NM, i.CSL_NO, i.GCOUN_BGNG_DT, i.GCOUN_DDLN_DT, i.GCOUN_LMT_COUNT, i.GCOUN_DTL_CN, i.GCOUN_PROG_STA_NM, i.GCOUN_FILENM, i.GCOUN_CONTS_CN, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM GROUP_COUN_APPLICANT a WHERE a.GCOUN_CD = i.GCOUN_CD AND a.GCOUN_STA_NM = '신청중') AS GCOUN_REG_COUNT FROM GROUP_COUN_INFO i WHERE i.GCOUN_NM LIKE CONCAT('%', #{searchValue}, '%') ORDER BY i.GCOUN_DT

SELECT i.GCOUN_CD, i.GCOUN_DT, i.GCOUN_NM, i.CSL_NO, i.GCOUN_BGNG_DT, i.GCOUN_DDLN_DT, i.GCOUN_LMT_COUNT, i.GCOUN_DTL_CN, i.GCOUN_PROG_STA_NM, i.GCOUN_FILENM, i.GCOUN_CONTS_CN, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM GROUP_COUN_APPLICANT a WHERE a.GCOUN_CD = i.GCOUN_CD AND a.GCOUN_STA_NM = '신청중') AS GCOUN_REG_COUNT FROM GROUP_COUN_INFO i WHERE i.GCOUN_PROG_STA_NM = #{status} AND i.GCOUN_NM LIKE CONCAT('%', #{searchValue}, '%') ORDER BY i.GCOUN_DT
SELECT GCOUN_CONTS_CN FROM GROUP_COUN_INFO WHERE GCOUN_PROG_STA_NM = '모집중' ORDER BY GCOUN_DT
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO GROUP_COUN_APPLICANT (STUD_NO, GCOUN_CD, GCOUN_CURRENT_DT) VALUES(#{STUD_NO}, #{GCOUN_CD}, #{GCOUN_CURRENT_DT})
mapper.select: SELECT p.PF_NM, p.PF_TELNO, p.PF_EMAIL, n.NTN_NM, s.SCSBJT_NM, s.STUD_NM, s.TELNO, s.STUD_EML_ADDR, s.COL_REG, s.STUD_BRDT, s.STUD_GEN , s.STUD_NO FROM STUD_INFO s JOIN PF_INFO p ON s.PF_NO = p.PF_NO JOIN NATIONAL_INFO n ON s.NTN_CD = n.NTN_CD WHERE STUD_NO = #{userId}
